Author: fishonthesun
Text: You posted this 10 hours ago but I'm just now seeing it. I'm sorry you feel this way. If it helps at all, breakfast, dinner, and half a bottle of wine is still less than an average person. Your dinner sounds healthy, yummy, and low calorie too! From an outside perspective also with eating problems, you deserve to feel GOOD about yesterday's eating. It's probably more than you usually eat, but that's okay. Our bodies need more than we give it, so it's okay to give it closer to what it needs.
